name: Café Latte
description: A smooth blend of espresso and steamed milk, topped with a layer of milk foam.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + steamed milk + milk foam.

name: Cappuccino
description: A balanced mix of espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam, served in a small-sized cup.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + steamed milk + milk foam.

name: Espresso
description: A small amount of highly concentrated and strong coffee, served in a small cup.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso (approximately 30ml).

name: Americano
description: A cup of espresso diluted with hot water, resulting in a smoother drink than espresso.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + hot water.

name: Mocha
description: A delicious blend of espresso, chocolate, and milk, topped with whipped cream.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + chocolate syrup + steamed milk + whipped cream.

name: Affogato
description: An indulgent combination of espresso and vanilla ice cream, perfect for those who love both coffee and sweets.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Flat White
description: A coffee with milk similar to a latte, but with less foam and a higher coffee proportion.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + steamed milk + a thin layer of milk foam.

name: Irish Coffee
description: A comforting blend of hot coffee, Irish whiskey, sugar, and whipped cream, perfect for warming up on chilly days.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + Irish whiskey + sugar + whipped cream.

name: Macchiato
description: An espresso 'stained' with a small amount of steamed milk or milk foam, adding smoothness and texture.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + a dash of steamed milk or milk foam.

name: Café au Lait
description: A simple and comforting combination of brewed coffee and steamed milk, perfect for starting the day.
recipe: Brewed coffee + steamed milk.

name: Ristretto
description: A shorter and more concentrated espresso than the traditional one, with a more intense flavor and less bitterness.
recipe: Less water than a traditional espresso, resulting in a smaller amount of beverage.

name: Turkish Coffee
description: A traditional way of preparing coffee where coffee grounds are boiled with water and sugar in a special pot called 'cezve'.
recipe: Ground coffee + water + sugar, boiled together in a cezve.

name: Viennese Coffee
description: An espresso served with whipped cream and cocoa sprinkled on top, perfect for chocolate lovers.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + whipped cream + cocoa powder.

name: Iced Coffee
description: A refreshing coffee beverage served over ice, perfect for hot days.
recipe: Chilled brewed coffee + ice.

name: Amaretto Coffee
description: A variation of Irish coffee, but instead of whiskey, amaretto liqueur is added for a sweet and almond flavor.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + amaretto liqueur + sugar + whipped cream.

name: Café de Olla
description: A traditional Mexican beverage where coffee is boiled with piloncillo (brown sugar), cinnamon, and cloves.
recipe: Ground coffee + water + piloncillo + cinnamon + cloves, boiled together.

name: Honey Coffee
description: A sweet variation of coffee where honey is added instead of sugar to sweeten the drink.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + honey + milk (optional).

name: Cream Coffee
description: An indulgent coffee version where heavy cream is added instead of milk for a rich and creamy flavor.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + heavy cream.

name: Spiced Coffee
description: An aromatic variation of coffee where spices like cinnamon, cardamom, or nutmeg are added for a unique flavor.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + spices to taste (cinnamon, cardamom, nutmeg, etc.).

name: Hazelnut Coffee
description: A delicious combination of espresso with a hint of hazelnut liqueur for a smooth and aromatic flavor.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + hazelnut liqueur.

name: Caramel Coffee
description: A sweet variation of coffee where caramel syrup is added for a rich and indulgent flavor.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + caramel syrup + milk.

name: Vanilla Coffee
description: A sweet variation of coffee where vanilla extract is added for a smooth and aromatic flavor.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + vanilla extract + milk.

name: Almond Coffee
description: A delicious variation of coffee where almond milk is added for a smooth and nutty flavor.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + almond milk.

name: White Chocolate Coffee
description: An indulgent variation of coffee where white chocolate is melted for a sweet and creamy flavor.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + melted white chocolate + milk.

name: Cinnamon Coffee
description: An aromatic variation of coffee where ground cinnamon is added for a warm and comforting flavor.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + ground cinnamon + milk.

name: Chocolate Coffee
description: A comforting combination of coffee and hot chocolate for those who love both flavors.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + hot chocolate + milk.

name: Orange Coffee
description: An aromatic variation of coffee where orange essence is added for a citrusy and refreshing flavor.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + orange essence + milk.

name: Peppermint Coffee
description: A refreshing variation of coffee where peppermint syrup is added for a cool and invigorating flavor.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + peppermint syrup + milk.

name: Kahlua Coffee
description: An indulgent variation of coffee where Kahlua liqueur is added for a smooth and coffee-flavored taste.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + Kahlua liqueur + milk.

name: Maple Coffee
description: A sweet variation of coffee where maple syrup is added for a smooth and rich flavor.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + maple syrup + milk.

name: Nutmeg Coffee
description: An aromatic variation of coffee where ground nutmeg is added for a warm and comforting flavor.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + ground nutmeg + milk.

name: Coconut Coffee
description: A tropical variation of coffee where coconut milk is added for a smooth and exotic flavor.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + coconut milk.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: A delicious variation of coffee where caramel syrup is drizzled on top of a latte for a sweet and indulgent flavor.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + steamed milk + milk foam + caramel drizzle.

name: Honey Cinnamon Coffee
description: A sweet and aromatic variation of coffee where honey and cinnamon are added for a warm and comforting flavor.
recipe: 1 shot of espresso + honey + ground cinnamon + milk.

name: Condensed Milk Coffee
description: A sweet and creamy variation of coffee where condensed milk is added for a rich and indulgent flavor.
